channel.title: Month in Review on edel grace altares
channel.description: Recent content in Month in Review on edel grace altares

item.title: December 2018 in Review
item.description: November went by super fast. I was taking a look at my to do list this morning and I saw that my “first of the the month” tasks were appearing. The beginning of November feels like just yesterday. Highlights I blocked Reddit from all my browsers While I didn’t successfully avoid Reddit altogether (I would check links that friends would send me or sit with my friends and looked at Reddit together), I managed to not browse Reddit on my own.
